visual_directives: Black and white fine art landscape photography in the style of Ansel Adams. Photorealistic. High contrast usage of the Zone System, ranging from deep void blacks to bright crisp whites. Dramatic lighting and weather conditions. Extreme depth of field (f/64 group aesthetic) ensuring everything from foreground to background is in sharp focus. Majestic nature, sweeping vistas, rocky textures, and dramatic clouds. Monochrome only.
